pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL
1. DESIGN & CONSTRUCTION OF ALL WORK ON THIS PROJECT SHALL CONFORM TO THE LATEST EDITION OF THE FOLLOWING CODES:
ONTARIO BUILDING CODE
OBC 9.23 WOOD FRAMING
OBC 4.1 STRUCTURAL DESIGN
2. STRUCTURAL DESIGN & ENGINEERING REVIEW BY WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. (WEL) IS FOR THE STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS OF THE SYSTEMS AS INDICATED WITHIN THESE PLANS. NO ONTARIO BUILDING CODE REVIEW IS PROVIDED.
3. THE DESIGN CODE ANALYSIS NOTED BY THE PARTY WITH WHOM WEL HAS ENTERED INTO A CONTRACT. THE CLIENT AND/OR THE USER OF THIS DOCUMENT ACCEPT THAT AT THE TIME OF OUR REVIEW, WEL IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DESIGN OR CHANGES ARISING FROM INFORMATION, REVIEW, OR SITE VISITS WHICH OCCUR AS A RESULT OF ANY CHANGES, ADDITIONS OR CORRECTIONS TO THE DESIGN OR CONSTRUCTION.
4. THESE PLANS ARE INTENDED TO SUPPLEMENT THE STAMPED DRAWINGS AND OBC PART 9 CALCULATIONS PROVIDED.
5. INSPECTIONS: ALL REQUIRED INSPECTIONS WILL BE DONE BY THE LOCAL BUILDING DEPARTMENT. WEL WILL BE REQUIRED TO PERFORM AN INSPECTION, CALL 519-267-6789. ALLOW A MINIMUM OF 3 BUSINESS DAYS NOTICE.
6. NO CHANGES SHALL BE MADE TO THE STAMPED DRAWINGS WITHOUT NOTIFYING WEL PRIOR TO THE COMMENCEMENT OF WORK.
7. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL CHECK AND VERIFY ALL SITE CONDITIONS AND MEASUREMENTS, AND REPORT ANY DISCREPANCIES TO THE ENGINEER.

DESIGN LOADS
1. DESIGN LOADS UNFACTORED UNLESS NOTED OTHERWISE:

ROOF DESIGN LOADS:
DEAD LOAD = 0.5 kPa
SNOW LOAD = 1.9 kPa (IF ROOF TRUSSES / JOISTS OR TRUSS TOP CHORDS)
SNOW LOAD = 2.4 kPa (IF ROOF WITH LOW SLOPE, AS PER OBC 4.1.2.2)
WIND LOAD = 0.5 kPa
LIVE LOAD = 1.0 kPa (IF ROOF WITH LOW SLOPE)
CEILING DESIGN LOADS:
DEAD LOAD = 0.35 kPa (IF ATTIC ACCESSIBLE)
ATTIC FLOOR = 0.5 kPa (IF ATTIC ACCESSIBLE)
TOTAL SPECIFIED SNOW LOAD = 2.5 kPa, AS PER OBC 4.1.2.4(1)

ACCESSIBLE FLOOR:
DEAD LOAD = 0.5 kPa (IF LOFT LOADING BELOW)
LIVE LOAD = 1.9 kPa (IF LOFT LOADING BELOW)
LIVE LOAD = 2.4 kPa (IF LOFT LOADING BELOW)
GUARD LOADS: AS PER OBC 2012 4.1.5.14(1)
